articles.description: BoAt has recently launched a new smartwatch in collaboration with Mappls MapmyIndia navigation capabilities. The wearable comes with call support, a sensitive microphone and a clear speaker for the users. Also, it comes with IP67 certification.
articles.content: BoAt, an Indian wearables brand has unleashed its latest smartwatch named, the Storm Call 3. The device has been introduced with built-in turn-by-turn navigation which has been powered by Mappls Mapm… [+1972 chars]

articles.author: David Delima
articles.title: Vivo Y200i With Snapdragon 4 Gen 2, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera Launched: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Vivo Y200i has been launched by the company in China with a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chip and up to 12GB of RAM. The phone has a 50-megapixel rear camera and packs a 6,000mAh battery with 44W fast charging support. It also has an IP64 rating for dust and splash res…
articles.content: Vivo Y200i has arrived in China as the latest Y-series phone to be launched by the smartphone maker. This handset runs on Android14-based OriginOS 4 and packs a 6,000mAh battery with support for 44W … [+1924 chars]
